page.title: 12Cramlington:Industry
page.content: The Industrial Estate covers a large area of land on the outskirts of the town. It is well laid out and signposted to help strangers to the area. There are a wide range of factories which have provided many jobs for the town and surrounding areas. Many companies chose this area because of the cheap rents and good rail and road access. The landscape around the estate blends in with the countryside. The factories on the Estate include: Commercial Plastics, Fassons, Cascade, Wilkinson Sword, American Air Filters, Bestobell Chemicals, Ronson, J.J.Electronics, Metro Sports, Dunlop-Angus, Boots Company, Bristol Myers, Lonrho Textiles, and Merck, Sharp and Dohme. St.Peter's M.S.
